anya-e0802n6:16: Atha sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ yāni yāni pubbakāni cha padāni, tāni tāni parassapadasaññāni honti.
anya-e0802n6:17: Taṃ yathā? Ti anti, si tha, mi ma.
anya-e0802n6:20: Sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ yāni yāni parāni cha padāni. Tāni tāni attanopadasaññāni honti.
anya-e0802n6:21: Taṃ yathā? Te ante, se vhe, e mhe.
anya-e0802n6:22: Attanopadamiccanena kvattho? Attanopadāni bhāve ca kammani.
anya-e0802n6:24: Tāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ parassapadānaṃ, attanopadānañca dve dve padāni paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisasaññāni honti.
anya-e0802n6:25: Taṃ yathā? Ti anti iti paṭhamapurisā, si tha iti majjhimapurisā, mi ma iti uttamapurisā. Attanopadānampi te ante iti paṭhamapurisā, se vhe iti majjhimapurisā, e mhe iti uttamapurisā. Evaṃ sabbattha.
anya-e0802n6:26: Paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisamiccanena kvattho? Nāmamhi payujjamānepi tulyādhikaraṇe paṭhamo, tumhe majjhimo, amhe uttamo.
anya-e0802n6:28: Sabbesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ paṭhamamajjhimuttama purisānaṃ ekābhidhāne paro puriso gahetabbo.
anya-e0802n6:29: So ca paṭhati, tvañca paṭhasi, tumhe paṭhatha. So ca pacati, tvañca pacasi. Tumhe pacatha. Evaṃ sesāsu vibhattīsu paro puriso yojetabbo.
anya-e0802n6:31: Nāmamhi payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi tulyādhikaraṇe paṭhamapuriso hoti.
anya-e0802n6:34: Tulyādhikaraṇeti kimatthaṃ? Tena haññase tvaṃ devadattena.
anya-e0802n6:36: Tumhe payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi tulyādhikaraṇe majjhimapuriso hoti.
anya-e0802n6:41: Amhe payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi tulyādhikaraṇe uttamapuriso hoti.
anya-e0802n6:51: Āṇatyatthe ca āsīsatthe ca anuttakāle pañcamī vibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n6:54: Anumatyatthe ca parikappatthe ca anuttakāle sattamī vibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n6:60: Hiyyopabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe vā apaccakkhe vā hiyyattanī vibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n6:61: So agamā maggaṃ, te agamū maggaṃ.
anya-e0802n6:63: Ajjappabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe vā apaccakkhe vā samīpe ajjatanīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n6:64: So maggaṃ agamī, te maggaṃ agamuṃ.
anya-e0802n6:66: Hiyyattanīajjatanīiccetā vibhattiyo yadā māyogā, tadā sabbakāle ca honti.
anya-e0802n6:67: Mā gamā, mā vacā, mā gamī, mā vacī.
anya-e0802n6:71: So gacchissati, karissati. Te gacchissanti, karissanti.
anya-e0802n6:73: Kriyātipannamatte atīte kāle kālātipatti vibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n6:74: So ce taṃ yānaṃ alabhissā, agacchissā. Te ce taṃ yānaṃ alabhissaṃsu, agacchissaṃsu.
anya-e0802n6:75: 423, 426.Vattamānā ti anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe, e mhe.
anya-e0802n6:76: Vattamānā iccesā saññā hoti ti anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe, e mhe iccetesaṃ dvādasannaṃ padānaṃ.
anya-e0802n6:78: 424, 450.Pañcamī tu antu, hitha, mima, taṃ antaṃ, ssu vho, e āmase.
anya-e0802n6:79: Pañcamīiccesā saññā hoti tu antu, hi tha, mima, taṃ antaṃ, ssu vho, e āmase iccetesaṃ dvādasannaṃ padānaṃ.
anya-e0802n6:81: 425, 453.Sattamī eyya eyyuṃ, eyyā si eyyā tha, eyyāmi eyyāma, etha eraṃ, etho eyyāvho, eyyaṃ eyyāmhe.
anya-e0802n6:82: Sattamī iccesā saññā hoti eyya eyyuṃ, eyyāsi eyyātha, eyyāmi eyyāma, etha eraṃ, etho, eyyāvho, eyyaṃ eyyāmhe iccetesaṃ dvādasannaṃ padānaṃ.
anya-e0802n6:84: 426, 459.Parokkhā au ettha, aṃmha, tthare, ttho vho, iṃ mhe.
anya-e0802n6:85: Parokkhā iccesā saññā hoti a u, ettha, aṃ mha, ttha re ttho vho, iṃ mhe iccetesaṃ dvādasannaṃ padānaṃ.
anya-e0802n6:87: 427, 455.Hiyyattanīāū, ottha, aṃmhā, tthatthuṃ, se vhaṃ, iṃ mhase.
anya-e0802n6:88: Hiyyattanī iccesā saññā hoti ā ū, o ttha, aṃ mhā, ttha tthuṃ, se vhaṃ, iṃ mhase iccetesaṃ dvādasannaṃ padānaṃ.
anya-e0802n6:89: Hiyyattanī iccanena kvattho? Hiyyopabhuti paccakkhe hiyyattanī.
anya-e0802n6:90: 428, 468.Ajjatanī ī uṃ, o ttha, iṃ mhā, ā ū, se vhaṃ, aṃ mhe.
anya-e0802n6:91: Ajjatanī iccesā saññā hoti ī uṃ, o ttha, iṃmhā, ā ū, sevhaṃ, aṃ mhe iccetesaṃ dvādasannaṃ padānaṃ.
anya-e0802n6:93: 429, 472.Bhavissantī ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssāmi ssāma, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssaṃ ssāmhe.
anya-e0802n6:94: Bhavissantī iccesā saññā hoti ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssāmi ssāma, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssaṃ ssāmhe iccetesaṃ dvādasannaṃ padānaṃ.
anya-e0802n6:96: 430, 373.Kālātipattissā ssaṃsu, sse ssatha, ssaṃ ssāmhā, ssatha sissu, ssase ssavhe, ssiṃ ssāmhase.
anya-e0802n6:97: Kālātipatti iccesā saññā hoti ssā ssaṃsu, sse ssatha, ssaṃ ssāmhā, ssatha ssisu, ssase ssavhe, ssiṃ ssāmhase iccetesaṃ dvādasannaṃ padānaṃ.
anya-e0802n6:98: Kālātipatti iccanena kvattho? Kriyātipanne’ tīte kālātipatti.
anya-e0802n6:100: Hiyyattanādayo catasso vibhattiyo sabbadhātuka saññā honti.
anya-e0802n6:107: Karoti, gacchati. Yo koci karoti, taṃ añño ‘‘karohi karohi’’ iccevaṃ bravīti, atha vā karontaṃ payojayati = kāreti. Saṅgho pabbatamiva attānamācarati = pabbatāyati. Taḷākaṃ samuddamiva attānamācarati = samuddāyati, saddo cicciṭamiva attānamācarati = cicciṭāyati, vasiṭṭhassa apaccaṃ vāsiṭṭho. Evamaññepi yojetabbā.
anya-e0802n6:108: 433, 528.Tija gupa kita māne hi kha cha sā vā.
anya-e0802n6:109: Tija gupa kita mānu iccetehi dhātūhi kha cha sa iccete paccayā honti vā.
anya-e0802n6:113: Bhujaghasa hara su pāiccevamādīhi dhātūhi tumicchatthesu kha cha saiccete paccayā honti vā.
anya-e0802n6:119: Saṅgho pabbatamiva attānamācarati = pabbatāyati, taḷākaṃ samuddamiva attānamācarati = samuddāyati, saddo cicciṭamiva attānamācarati = cicciṭāyati. Evamaññepi yojetabbā.
anya-e0802n6:121: Nāmato upamānā ācāratthe ca īyapaccayo hoti.
anya-e0802n6:122: Achattaṃ chattamiva ācarati =chattīyati, aputtaṃ puttamiva ācarati=puttīyati.
anya-e0802n6:124: Ācāreti kimatthaṃ? Achattaṃ chattamiva rakkhati. Evamaññepi yojetabbā.
anya-e0802n6:127: Attano pattamicchati = pattīyati. Evaṃ vatthīyati, parikkhārīyati, cīvarīyati, dhanīyati, ghaṭīyati.
anya-e0802n6:128: Atticchattheti kimatthaṃ? Aññassa pattamicchati. Evamaññepi yojetabbā.
anya-e0802n6:129: 438, 540.Dhātūhi ṇe ṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayā kāritāni hetvatthe.
anya-e0802n6:130: Sabbehi dhātūhi ṇeṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayaiccete paccayā honti kāritasaññā ca hetvatthe.
anya-e0802n6:131: Yo koci karoti, taṃ añño ‘‘karohi karohi’’ iccevaṃ bravīti, atha vā karontaṃ payojayati = kāreti, kārayati, kārāpeti, kārā payati. Ye keci karonti, te aññe ‘‘karotha karotha’’ iccevaṃ bruvanti = kārenti, kārayanti, kārāpenti, kārāpayanti. Yo koci pacati, taṃ añño ‘‘pacāhi pacāhi’’iccevaṃ bravīti, atha vā pacantaṃ payojayati = pāceti, pācayati, pācāpeti, pācāpayati. Ye keci pacanti, te aññe ‘‘pacatha pacatha’’ iccevaṃ bruvanti = pācenti, pācayanti, pācāpenti. Pācāpayanti. Evaṃ bhaṇeti, bhaṇayati, bhaṇāpeti, bhaṇāpayati. Bhaṇenti, bhaṇayanti, bhaṇāpenti, bhaṇāpayanti. Tathariva aññepi yojetabbā.
anya-e0802n6:135: Tasmā nāmasmā ṇayapaccayo hoti kāritasañño ca dhāturūpe sati.
anya-e0802n6:136: Hatthinā atikkamati maggaṃ = atihatthayati, vīṇāya upagāyati gītaṃ = upavīṇayati, daḷhaṃ karoti vīriyaṃ = daḷhayati, visuddhā hoti ratti = visuddhayati.
anya-e0802n6:137: Caggahaṇena āra ālaiccete paccayā honti. Santaṃ karoti = santārati, upakkamaṃ karoti = upakkamālati.
anya-e0802n6:140: Ṭhīyate, bujjhate, paccate, labbhate, karīyate, yujjate, uccate.
anya-e0802n6:143: Tassa yapaccayassa cavaggayakāravakārattaṃ hoti dhātūnaṃ antena saha yathāsambhavaṃ.
anya-e0802n6:144: Vuccate, vuccante, uccate, uccante, paccate, paccante. Majjate, majjante, yujjate, yujjante. Bujjhate, bujjhante, kujjhate, kujjhante, ujjhate, ujjhante. Haññate, haññante. Kayyate, kayyante. Dibbate, dibbante.
anya-e0802n6:146: Sabbehi dhātūhi yamhi paccaye, pare ivaṇṇāgamo hoti vā.
anya-e0802n6:151: Vuḍḍhate, phallate, dammate, sakkate, labbhate, dissate.
anya-e0802n6:153: Yathā heṭṭhā bhāvakammesu yapaccayassa ādeso hoti tathā kattaripi yapaccayassa ādeso kātabbo.
anya-e0802n6:159: Rudhaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato apaccayo hoti kattari, pubbe niggahitāgamo hoti.
anya-e0802n6:161: Caggahaṇena i ī e oiccete paccayā honti niggahitapubbañca.
anya-e0802n6:162: Rundhiti, rundhīti, rundheti, rundhoti, sumbhoti, parisumbhoti.
anya-e0802n6:167: Suiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ṇu ṇā u ṇāiccete paccayā honti kattari.
anya-e0802n6:168: Abhisuṇoti , abhisuṇāti, saṃvuṇoti, saṃvuṇāti, āvuṇoti, āvuṇāti, pāpuṇoti, pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0802n6:171: Kiṇāti, jināti, dhunāti, munāti, lunāti, punāti.
anya-e0802n6:173: Gahaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ppaṇhāiccete paccayā honti kattari.
anya-e0802n6:176: Tanuiccevamādito dhātugaṇato o yiraiccete paccayā honti kattari.
anya-e0802n6:177: Tanoti , tanohi, karoti, karohi, kayi rati, kayirāhi.
anya-e0802n6:179: Curaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ṇe ṇayaiccete paccayā honti kattari, kāritasaññā ca.
anya-e0802n6:180: Coreti, corayati, cinteti, cintayati, manteti, mantayati.
anya-e0802n6:182: Bhāve ca kammani ca attanopadāni honti.
anya-e0802n6:183: Uccate, uccante, majjate, majjante, yujjate, yujjante, kujjhate, kujjhante, labbhate, labbhante, kayyate, kayyante.
anya-e0802n6:189: Titikkhati , jigucchati, vīmaṃsati, samuddāyati, puttīyati, kāreti, pāceti.
anya-e0802n6:194: Bhūiccevamādayo ye saddagaṇā, te dhātusaññā honti.
anya-e0802n6:195: Bhavati, bhavanti, carati, caranti, pacati, pacanti, cintayati, cintayanti, hoti, honti, gacchati, gacchanti.
anya-e0802n6:199: Ādibhūtānaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ ekassarānaṃ kvaci dvebhāvo hoti.
anya-e0802n6:200: Titikkhati , jigucchati, tikicchati, vīmaṃsati, bubhukkhati, pivāsati, daddallati, dadāti, jahāti, caṅkamati.
anya-e0802n6:203: Dvebhūtassa dhātussa yo pubbo, so abbhāsasañño hoti.
anya-e0802n6:206: Abbhāse vattamānassa sarassa rasso hoti. Dadhāti, jahāti.
anya-e0802n6:211: Abbhāse vattamānassa kavaggassa ca vaggo hoti.
anya-e0802n6:212: Cikicchati , jigucchati, jighacchati, jigīsati, jaṅgamati, caṅkamati.
anya-e0802n6:214: Mānakitaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ abbhāsagatānaṃ vakāra takārattaṃ hoti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ.
anya-e0802n6:221: Abbhāsassa antassa ivaṇṇo hoti, akāro vā.
anya-e0802n6:222: Jigucchati, pivāsati, vīmaṃsati, jighacchati, babhūva, dadhāti.
anya-e0802n6:229: Tato abbhāsato pāmānaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ vāmaṃiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ sapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n6:240: Ñāiccetassa dhātussa jā jaṃ nāādesā honti vā.
anya-e0802n6:243: Disaiccetassa dhātussa passa dissa dakkhaiccete ādesā honti vā.
anya-e0802n6:247: Byañjanantassa dhātussa co hoti chapaccayesu paresu.
anya-e0802n6:250: Byañjanantassa dhātussa ko hoti khapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n6:253: Haraiccetassa dhātussa sabbasseva gīādeso hoti sapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n6:256: Brūbhūiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ āhabhūvaiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ parokkhāyaṃ vibhattiyaṃ.
anya-e0802n6:260: Gamuiccetassa dhātussa anto makāro ccho hoti vā sabbāsu paccayavibhattīsu.
anya-e0802n6:261: Gacchamāno, gacchanto. Gacchati, gameti. Gacchatu, gametu. Gaccheyya. Gameyya. Agacchā, agamā. Agacchī, agamī. Gacchissati, gamissati. Agacchissā, agamissā.
anya-e0802n6:264: Vacaiccetassa dhātussa akāro ottamāpajjate ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n6:270: Mikāraggahaṇena hivibhattimhi akāro kvaci na dīghamāpajjate. Gacchahi.
anya-e0802n6:273: Gaccha, gacchāhi, gama, gamāhi, gamaya, gamayāhi.
anya-e0802n6:276: Hūiccetassa dhātussa saro e ha oha ettamāpajja te bhavissantimhi, ssassa ca lopo hoti vā.
anya-e0802n6:277: Hehiti, hehinti, hohiti, hohinti, heti, henti, hehissati, hehissanti, hohissati, hohissanti, hessati, hessanti.
anya-e0802n6:281: Karaiccetassa dhātussa sapaccayassa kāhādeso hoti vā bhavissantimhi vibhattimhi, sassa ca niccaṃ lopo hoti.
anya-e0802n6:282: Kāhati, kāhiti, kāhasi, kāhisi, kāhāmi, kāhāma.
anya-e0802n6:284: Sapaccayaggahaṇena aññehipi bhavissantiyā vibhattiyā khāmi khāma chāmi chāmaiccādayo ādesā honti. Vakkhāmi, vakkhāma, vacchāmi, vacchāma.
anya-e0802n6:288: Dāiccetassa dhātussa antassa aṃ hoti mimaiccetesu.
anya-e0802n6:292: Kāreti, kārenti, kārayati, kārayanti, kārāpeti, kārāpenti, kārāpayati, kārāpayanti.
anya-e0802n6:295: Ghaṭādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ asaṃyogantānaṃ vuddhi hoti vā kārite.
anya-e0802n6:296: Ghāṭeti, ghaṭeti, ghāṭayati, ghaṭayati, ghāṭāpeti, ghaṭāpeti, ghāṭāpayati, ghaṭāpayati, gāmeti, gameti, gāmayati, gamayati, gāmāpeti, gamāpeti. Gāmāpayati, gamāpayati.
anya-e0802n6:299: Aññesu ca paccayesu sabbesaṃ dhātūnaṃ asaṃyogantānaṃ vuddhi hoti.
anya-e0802n6:303: Guha dusaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ saro dīghamāpajjate kārite.
anya-e0802n6:306: Vaca vasa vahaiccevamādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vakārassa ukāro hoti yapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n6:309: Hakārassa vipariyayo hoti yapaccaye pare, yapaccayassa ca lo hoti vā.
anya-e0802n6:312: Gahaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa ghekāro hoti ppapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n6:315: Gahaiccetassa dhātussa hakārassa lopo hoti ṇhāmhi paccaye pare.
anya-e0802n6:318: Karaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa kāsattaṃ hoti vā ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n6:320: Kāsattamitibhāvaniddesena aññatthāpi sāgamo hoti. Ahosi, adāsi.
anya-e0802n6:322: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā mimaiccetesaṃ vibhattīnaṃ mhimhādesā honti vā, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0802n6:325: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā thassa vibhattissa tthattaṃ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0802n6:328: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā tissa vibhattissa tthittaṃ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0802n6:331: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā tussa vibhattissa tthuttaṃ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0802n6:334: Asasseva dhātussa simhi vibhattimhi antassa lopo ca hoti.
anya-e0802n6:337: Labhaiccetāya dhātuyā ī iṃnaṃ vibhattīnaṃ ttha tthaṃādesā honti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0802n6:340: Kusaiccetāya dhātuyā īvibhattissa cchihoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0802n6:343: Dāiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa dajjādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n6:346: Vadaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa vajjādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n6:349: Gamuiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa ghammādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n6:352: 502, 493.Yamhi dā dhā mā ṭhā hā pā mahamathādīnamī.
anya-e0802n6:353: Yamhi paccaye pare dā dhā mā ṭhā hā pā maha matha iccevamādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ anto īkāramāpajjate.
anya-e0802n6:354: Dīyati, dhīyati, mīyati, ṭhīyati, hīyati, pīyati, mahīyati, mathīyati.
anya-e0802n6:356: Yajaiccetassa dhātussa ādissa ikārādeso hoti yapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n6:362: Jara mara iccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ jīra jiyya miyyādesā honti vā.
anya-e0802n6:363: Jīrati, jīranti, jiyyati, jiyyanti, miyyati, miyyanti, marati, maranti.
anya-e0802n6:365: Sabbattha vibhattipaccayesu asaiccetassa dhātussa ādissa lopo hoti vā.
anya-e0802n6:373: Eyyassa vibhattissa ñāiccetāya dhātuyā parassa iyā ñāādesā honti vā.
anya-e0802n6:377: Ñāiccetāya dhātuyā parassa nāpaccayassa lopo hoti vā, yakārattañca.
anya-e0802n6:392: Okārassa dhātvantassa sare pare avādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n6:396: Ekārassa dhātvantassa sare pare ayādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n6:399: Te o eiccete āva āyādese pāpuṇanti kārite.
anya-e0802n6:401: Yogavibhāgena aññasmimpi ekārassa āyādeso hoti. Gāyati, gāyanti.
anya-e0802n6:405: Asabbadhātukamhīti kimatthaṃ? Gacchati, karoti, labhati, pacati.
anya-e0802n6:407: Idha ākhyāte aniddiṭṭhesu sādhanesu kvaci dhātuvibhattipaccayānaṃ dīghaviparītādesalopāgamaiccetāni kāriyāni jinavacanānurūpāni kātabbāni.
anya-e0802n6:408: Jāyati , kareyya, jāniyā, siyā, kare, gacche, jaññā, vakkhetha, dakkhetha, dicchati, agacchi, agacchuṃ, ahosi, ahesuṃ iccevamādīni aññānipi sādhanāni yojetabbāni.
anya-e0802n6:414: Kvaci akārāgamo hoti hiyyattanī ajjatanīkālātipattiiccetāsu vibhattīsu.
anya-e0802n6:418: Brūiccetāya dhātuyā īkārāgamo hoti timhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n6:421: Dhātussa anto kvaci lopo hoti anekasarassa.
anya-e0802n6:426: Isu yamu iccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ anto ccho hoti vā. Icchati, niyacchati.
